product_name: Partners West The Needles of Rushmore: Climbing in South Dakota's Mt. Rushmore National Memorial
long_description: Friendly, informative and fully comprehensive, Needles of Rushmore fills you in on how to get started climbing in and around the beautiful Rushmore Memorial of South Dakota.
short_description: Friendly, informative and fully comprehensive, Needles of Rushmore fills you in on how to get started climbing in and around the beautiful Rushmore Memorial of South Dakota.
